Name: Soulmate
About the game: Soulmate is a Hack-and-Slash, Action Adventure where you use Magic, Guns, and Blades. Use strategic abilities in an Open World, to fight your way through Demons, and progress in an Emotional story. Soulmate is about what insanity can create, in a world full of coincidences. Features - Open World Explore a beautiful, expansive, Open World, full of Demons, as well as Eye Catching Environments. - Fast-Paced-Action Use your blades in a Combat System full of Gore, and non-stop action. - Boss Fights Take on dramatic Monsters, wielding Fire and Flames. - Story Enter a world where coincidences (or Fate?), is ever-expanding, creating insanity. - Art Soulmate shows off an amazing World, full of detail and polish, with RTX, and DLSS.
Meta Title: Soulmate: Oct 14, 2021, I_Dream_In_Peace and Full Overview
